description: You've got a set of udders down below.  Activate for fresh milk.
Your reproductive and digestive organs became those of an egg-laying reptile, at certain times you just feel the urge to lay an egg.  Activate to lay an egg.

spawn_item.message: You lay an egg. you release a pleased hiss.

description: Your reproductive and digestive organs became those of an Avian, at certain times you just feel the urge to lay an egg.  Activate to lay an egg.

spawn_item.message: You lay an egg. you release a pleased chirp.

description: Your reproductive and digestive organs became those of an fish, at certain times you just feel the urge to lay an roe.  Activate to lay an roe.

spawn_item.message: you lay a mass of roe. Blub Blub

description: Your reproductive and digestive organs became those of an spider, at certain times you just feel the urge to lay an egg.  Activate to lay an egg.

spawn_item.message: You wiggle your rear in excitement! You lay an slimy egg.
